cd_response.value: The command is still on cooldown
cd_response.label: Cooldown Response
cd_response.tooltip: The message that the bot will display.

Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

voteMaximum.label: Maximum vote amount
voteMaximum.tooltip: The limit that users will hit when voting.

dynamicCooldown.label: Dynamic Cooldown
dynamicCooldown.tooltip: Amount of logs used determines cooldown duration.

continuousVoting.label: Continuous voting
continuousVoting.tooltip: Allows users to continuously vote for an option

get_cooldown.label: get_cooldown
get_cooldown.tooltip: Display the user specified user's current cooldown, or returns false if they aren't on cooldown.
